aboutSection.html:
I'm currently working as a Full Stack Software Engineer at Bonatra. I specialize in building web applications and software systems using JavaScript and Python
I graduated with a B.Tech in Information Technology from Manipal Institute of Technology
When I'm not coding, I like to play the keyboard, hit the gym or look for new ice-cream flavours

experienceSection.description: Currently working as a full stack software engineer creating systems for devices like the Bonatra X1 Smart Ring and experiences on the web and mobile app
experienceSection.skills: Python, JavaScript, React, React Native, Frappe, SQL, MongoDB

experienceSection.description: Worked as an intern where I came up with a new audit log API for the platform and helped integrate it while migrating old logs into the new format
Received basic training in Python, SQL and Shell Scripting and completed relevant assignments and projects in the same
